On 8/15/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
> Simon Chappell wrote:
>
> > Actually, I really meant it when I said that without TDD, you'll only
> > ever write code that is "good enough". Quality code only comes from
> > using TDD.
>
> So quality code /only/ comes from TDD? I have 100 formal methods guys on
> Line 4 waiting to speak with you....

Please don't try to tell me that formal methods never produce bad
software. I am not falling for that.

Simon
